On a slightly off-topic note... does anyone know why it takes so long for a post to go through? It takes like a minute for me, and I'm on broadband...   
   
"And with the clicking, came the ticking   
of the page that was no more   
Quoth the server, 404" ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142038im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
It comes with MS Office, if I recall correctly.

Adriano, it doesn't matter how fast your computer is 'pushing' if the pipeline it's pushing into is too small to handle the flow (from a number of directions at once most likely).   
   
I like the take-off on Poe's "Raven", even though the situation isn't quite the same. ;-)

I know that, Mike - I just thought I'd mention in case someone said something silly like "If you're using a 14k modem it won't help you any..." ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142038im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Adriano,   
Just for future reference, Bank Gothic isn't among the   
fonts [listed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142038/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/default.asp) on this handy MS Typography page showing   
which fonts are bundled with which apps.

I stand corrected, Mike.   
And, to clear up this matter, Bank Gothic is bundled with CorelDraw and the Corel WordPerfect suite.
There is a shareware version of Bank Gothic called State Gothic.
